registeroptional-maywegettoknowyou: Hi %s, may we get to know you?
registeroptional-optionalexplanation: We have made an account for you. You can Part-up soon. Share some details of who you are. Other Uppers will appreciate it and it makes it possible for us to introduce you to the best Part-ups.
registeroptional-form-image-import: Easy, connect and use your Facebook or LinkedIn profile photo.
registeroptional-form-location_input-lab: Where do you want to join Part-ups?
registeroptional-form-location_input-pla: For example in your home town of region
registeroptional-form-location_input-too: We love to introduce you to the most interesting Part-ups in your area. And we think of you and the environment, so we will promote the Part-ups near you.
registeroptional-form-description-placeh: Give us a short discription of who you are and what your good at
registeroptional-form-description-toolti: Other Uppers would like to know who they are working with. What can you tell them about you? Promote yourself by being honest.
registeroptional-form-tags_input-tooltip: We use these words to see which Part-ups are a match. So choose words that represent what you can contribute in a Part-up. No need for perfection. You automatically complete your profile by collaborating in Part-ups.
registeroptional-form-socials-tooltip: Your profiles on social media tell something about who you are and what you are good at. Other Uppers have a change to get to know you even before you worked together.
registeroptional-form-website-label: Do you have a website or blog?
registeroptional-form-phonenumber-toolti: @@@Goede bereikbaarheid is belangrijk in samenwerking. Privacy ook. We laten je nummer daarom alleen zien aan de Uppers in jouw actieve Part-ups.
